title: Week Ending May 18, 2018
cleaned_text: Pharmacy Round Up Each week Associate Professor Jason Perepelkin prepares a summary of news articles pertaining to the practice of pharmacy in Canada and beyond, with a particular focus on social, administrative and managerial pharmacy issues. Most of the articles in the summary appear on his Twitter [@RxInterestGroup](https://twitter.com/rxinterestgroup). Please feel free to pass this along to any colleagues, and if they want to be placed on the e-mail list have them send an e-mail to [jason.perepelkin@usask.ca](mailto:jason.perepelkin@usask.ca). NOTE: In no way does the inclusion or exclusion of articles mean that Dr. Perepelkin supports or doesn't support the articles presented, or the views presented in the stories; they are simply a snapshot of issues in pharmacy in Canada and beyond.
